event.title: Gemstone Core Drill Bits
event.description:
Gemstone Core Drill Bits are faster drilling and much more durable than other standard carbide or metal drill bits, easy to charge and enables smaller hammer drills(turn off hammering) to drill large openings. best used for wet or perhaps dry applications of brick, tangible, asphalt, granite, marble, ceramic, glass even more. Greetools offer a variety connected with Diamond Core Drill Bits to assist you get the jobs done. If you cannot find a tool with the perfect fit we can custom make one to suit your needs. give us a call or perhaps drop us an email. pleased to assist.

Electroplated Diamond Core Drill Bits to become used with electric drill with out hammer action. The quality with the diamond allows the drilling of ceramics, porcelain, granite, marble as well as glass. cut faster and tidier, Saving you time and money but most of all giving you the finest lower.

Electroplated Diamond Grit Wet Drilling Core Drill Bits, the Edge is coated that has a quality mesh diamond, a light layer of “Electro-Plated” diamond jewelry provide high performance and activation time. ejection slot for easy removal of waste materials. compatible with corded or cord-less drills. electroplated diamond coating will wear off if the tool gets too hot. By no means let your drill bit run dry.

Electroplated Diamond Grit Main Drill Bits Wet Drilling

● Mark the tile and place the drill tip at the 45-degree angle.

● Start drilling plus level the drill once your tile surface is scored.

● Good drilling performance with “Exceptional” affordability

● A light layer of “Electro-Plated” diamonds competent at drilling hard Porcelain tiles

● Apply water throughout the entire drilling process using a compact spray bottle.

● For harder tiles try a slower RPM / for softer tiles work with a faster RPM.
